thread.title_full: Seven Colonial reviewed by Jan M. LaRocca

author: Jan M. LaRocca
title: Jan M. LaRocca
text: I was stunned, in a very positive way, when I received a phone call from Seven Colonial customer service to let me know that an item I had ordered had sold out and was on back-order. In addition to the call, I received an email and immediate credit to my account. I've had a couple of interactions since that resulted in my learning that another item I had sought elsewhere is also distributed by Seven Colonial. I've been put on a back-order list for both items and will be contacted by Seven Colonial when they are available. This is a first for me with online shopping! Very impressive and much appreciated. Great job!!! I will not only buy from you again, but will tell others. Great customer service is the best marketing dollars you can spend. Congratulations!
